XData.name: UrlMap
XData.Data:
<Routes> <!--========================================= IMPORT ================================================--> <!--[+]--> <!-- GET BY ID, Tournament --> <Route Method="GET" Url="/tournament/:id" Call="Dance.Web.JsonUser:GetTournamentById"/>
<!--[+]--> <!-- GET ALL [GRID], Tournament Import --> <Route Method="POST" Url="/import/tournament/grid" Call="Dance.Web.JsonAdmin:GetImportedTournaments"/>
<!--[+]--> <!-- GET ALL [GRID], Competition Import --> <Route Method="POST" Url="/import/competition/grid" Call="Dance.Web.JsonAdmin:GetImportedCompetitions"/>
<!--========================================= TOURNAMENT ================================================--> <!--[+]--> <!-- SAVE Tournament --> <Route Method="POST" Url="/tournament" Call="Dance.Web.JsonAdmin:SaveTournament"/>
<!--[+]--> <!-- DELETE BY ID (Hide from table), Tournament --> <Route Method="DELETE" Url="/tournament/:id" Call="Dance.Web.JsonUser:DeactivateTournament"/>
<!--========================================= COMPETITION ===============================================--> <!--[+]--> <!-- SAVE Competition --> <Route Method="POST" Url="/tournament/:id/competition" Call="Dance.Web.JsonUser:SaveCompetition"/>
<!--[+]--> <!-- SAVE ALL Competitions --> <Route Method="POST" Url="/tournament/:id/competition/all" Call="Dance.Web.JsonUser:SaveAllCompetitions"/>
<!--[+]--> <!-- DELETE BY ID (Hide from table), Competition --> <Route Method="DELETE" Url="/tournament/competition/:id" Call="Dance.Web.JsonUser:DeactivateCompetition"/>
<!--[+]--> <Route Method="GET" Url="/tournament/:id/competition/importlink" Call="Dance.Web.JsonCompetitionImport:WriteLinkToDevice"/>
<!--========================================= PARTICIPANT ===============================================--> <!--[+]--> <!-- DELETE BY ID (Hide from table), Participant --> <Route Method="DELETE" Url="/participant/:id" Call="Dance.Web.JsonParticipant:Deactivate"/>
<!--[+]--> <!-- Check access, authorization call, if needed --> <Route Method="GET" Url="/checkAdmin/:isLogin" Call="Dance.Web.JsonUser:CheckAdmin"/> </Routes>
